save_dataframe: [true | false] saves the dataframes of all the plots in a different files
load_dataframe: [true | false] loads the dataframes for the plots to run. First you should run with NO this option and with YES the previous option to generate them

autoencoder.layers: list of layers and their size. Eg. ['30','20','10','20','30']

denoising.layers: list of layers and their size. Eg. ['30','20','10','20','30']
